To connect to the Dashboard:

1. Activate WireGuard

2. Export the Kubeconfig file:
	-Run Command in command prompt: set KUBECONFIG=C:/Users/sebas/Downloads/k3s.yaml

3. Get the token for the default kubectl service
	-Run Command in command prompt: kubectl create token service

4. Run kubectl proxy to start dashboard

5. Go to this site and enter the token: http://localhost:8001/api/v1/namespaces/kubernetes-dashboard/services/https:kubernetes-dashboard:/proxy/#/login 


(Optional) Use Admin-User token:
